name: Action space
description:
ACTION SPACE

 Is top down shooter, where evrything is controlled by only one button. SPACE button. Choose one action, whatever it is walking, shooting, healing or even poisoning yourself. Everthing controlled by just one button (...and mouse...)

Story:

You are little robot called Boko, that lives in year 22XX.  The Earth is devastated by alien race, and those humans that survived now live in underground. You were designed to find last humans and help them survive.

Gameplay:

Choose one action option by holding space, and find your way to last humans. But be aware, that there are deadly aliens in your way.

This game was made during 48 hours GMTK game jam with central theme "ONLY ONE".
